title: aliveNFT
author: aliveNFT
content: Depositing and withdrawing money a real experienceThe information is active at the time of writing, this is solely my subjective point of view, it is not financial advice to make a deposit in one of these casinos.To get right to the point: I'll just show you the casinos where I once played and share a little feedback for you if someone doubts the choice.1. Stake AKA Primedice - ANN Stake.com / ANN Primedice.comBonus system : 9/10The fathers, the progenitors of the best product in the world in cryptocurrency gambling, It's no secret that Stake is the best of the best at the moment, the turnover, number of users and partners of this casino are huge.I have more than 100+ deposits and the same number of withdrawals in Stake and Primedice, for so many years I have not received a single error or delay or a request to pass KYC. But this does not mean that you will not be asked.In short: The best casino, the best design, the best games, the best community, the best bonuses.I didn't go through KYC (or I wasn't asked to go through for some action)2. Bitsler - ANN Bitsler.comBonus system : 7/10Another huge and rather old casino that can clearly be trusted, because the administration has proven everything with time and reputation. My personal experience in depositing and withdrawing funds is quite good, but there were moments when my deposits got stuck or it took 4 hours to solve some problem, this is probably the only problem I had. The bonus system is also good in this casino, but it does not reach the same scale Stake.com This is not surprising, you need to wager tons of money to get something.. In general, the casino is excellent and trusted. 5 out of 5.I didn't go through KYC (or I wasn't asked to go through for some action)3. JacksClub - ANN JacksClub.ioBonus system : 8/10The casino was announced in May 2020, which tells us that this casino is the youngest on my list, does that make it a bad one? - no. personally, I was really glad to discover this site, because there is everything there to sit down and start winning money (or losing). Quick inputs, money withdrawals, excellent design, fast response of the site, a variety of almost all providers and slots and constant bonuses from admins in the form of contests or giveaways (there is also an internal system of loyalty of players). I also had an incident, I made a deposit to the TRX address but sent USDT to the same network, they could not return it or help me solve this problemI didn't go through KYC (or I wasn't asked to go through for some action) This is not the whole list.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Did you make this list based off your personal experiences? Or you’re trying to create a review thread cause we already have tons of that here already. But if it’s based on persona experience then that’s okay, although I haven’t used any of them I do have a stake.com account but I don’t think I ever funded the account and it’s been a long time since I last logged into it. You should also consider moving this thread to gambling discussion board.

comments.author: aliveNFT
comments.body: Quote from: Cantsay on December 10, 2023, 07:47:43 AMDid you make this list based off your personal experiences? Or you’re trying to create a review thread cause we already have tons of that here already. But if it’s based on persona experience then that’s okay, although I haven’t used any of them I do have a stake.com account but I don’t think I ever funded the account and it’s been a long time since I last logged into it. You should also consider moving this thread to gambling discussion board. Yes, it is indicated at the top that this is my personal experience. Thanks for the advice to move the topic.
